alert.note: Alert for Central Brewster County; Chisos Basin; Lower Brewster County; Presidio Valley (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued March 27 at 8:30PM CDT until March 29 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING FOR VERY STRONG WINDS, LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY, AND EXTREMELY DRY FUELS... * AFFECTED AREA...Central Brewster County, Chisos Basin, Presidio Valley and Lower Brewster County. * TIMING...Tuesday morning through Tuesday evening. * WINDS...Southwest 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 6 percent. * RFTI...7 or extreme.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Heightened awareness is needed Tuesday as the potential for significant fires will increase and resource demand may be high.

area.areaDesc: Central Brewster County; Chisos Basin; Lower Brewster County; Presidio Valley
